autovv.usage:
*Usage:*
‚Ä¢ .autovv on - Enable auto reveal
‚Ä¢ .autovv off - Disable auto reveal
autovv.onMsg:
‚úÖ *Auto ViewOnce Enabled*

All view once messages will be automatically revealed and sent to DM.
autovv.offMsg:
‚ùå *Auto ViewOnce Disabled*

View once messages will no longer be revealed automatically.

language.title: Language Settings

tourl.description: > Convert an image or audio to a direct link
tourl.noMedia: > Please reply to an image or audio to convert it.

addgapi.usage:
*ADD GOOGLE API KEY*

Usage: .addgapi YOUR_API_KEY

Get your free key:
1. Go to https://aistudio.google.com
2. Click 'Get API key'
3. Create new API key
4. Copy and paste here
addgapi.success:
*GOOGLE API KEY ADDED*

Available commands (free tier):
‚îÉ .gemini - AI Chat (10 RPM)
‚îÉ .vision - Analyze images
‚îÉ .nanogen - Generate images (500/day)

Paid only:
‚îÉ Imagen 4 - Not available in free tier
‚îÉ Veo 3.1 - Not available in free tier
addgapi.invalid:
> Invalid API key

Check your key and try again

google.noApiKey:
> No Google API key configured

Use .addgapi YOUR_KEY to add one

vision.usage:
> Reply to an image with .vision <question>

Example: .vision What is in this image?

nanogen.usage:
> Usage: .nanogen <description>

Example: .nanogen a futuristic city at sunset

Free: 500 images/day, 15 RPM

status.display:
*GOOGLE AI STATUS*

API Key: {configured}
SDK: @google/genai
Tier: Free

google.quotaExceeded:
> Quota exceeded

Free tier: 10 RPM, 250 RPD
Wait 1 minute or upgrade to paid tier
google.invalidKey: > Invalid API key. Use .addgapi to update

locate.request:
*LOCATION REQUEST*

respond.status:
*AUTO RESPOND*

Status: {status}

Usage:
‚îÉ .respond on  - Enable
‚îÉ .respond off - Disable
respond.invalidOption: > Invalid option. Use: .respond on or .respond off

setrespond.usage:
> Reply to a message (text, image, video, audio, sticker or video note)

Examples:
‚îÉ Reply to text: .setrespond
‚îÉ Reply to image: .setrespond
‚îÉ Reply to video: .setrespond
‚îÉ Reply to audio: .setrespond
‚îÉ Reply to sticker: .setrespond
‚îÉ Reply to video note: .setrespond

> Series name required

dlserie.usage:
> Format required:
.dlserie Name | Season | Episode

Ex: .dlserie Lupin | 1 | 2
dlserie.notFound: > Series not found with these criteria

protection.groupOnly: This command can only be used in groups
protection.adminOnly: Only group admins can use this command
protection.botNotAdmin: The bot must be admin to use this feature

errors.ownerOnly: Only the bot owner can use this command
errors.commandFailed: An error occurred while executing the command
errors.commandNotFound: Command "{command}" not found. Use .help to see available commands

welcome.enabled:
‚úÖ *WELCOME MESSAGE ENABLED*

The bot will welcome new members.
welcome.setSuccess:
‚úÖ *WELCOME MESSAGE SET*

New message saved successfully.

Message: {msg}

Welcome is now enabled!
welcome.setUsage:
*SETWELCOME*

Usage: .setwelcome <message>

Variables:
{group} - Group name
{user} - User mention
{members} - Member count
{desc} - Group description

Example:
.setwelcome Welcome @user to {group}!

goodbye.enabled:
‚úÖ *GOODBYE MESSAGE ENABLED*

The bot will say goodbye to departing members.
goodbye.setSuccess:
‚úÖ *GOODBYE MESSAGE SET*

New message saved successfully.

Message: {msg}

Goodbye is now enabled!
goodbye.setUsage:
*SETGOODBYE*

Usage: .setgoodbye <message>

Variables:
{group} - Group name
{user} - User mention
{members} - Member count

Example:
.setgoodbye Goodbye @user from {group}

antidemote.enabled:
ANTIDEMOTE ENABLED

Admin demotion is forbidden.
